All Classes

Class
Description
Card
Card is an enum class, which contents all the information about the cards in this game.
ChatAndGameController
This class is the controller class for the Chat and Game Window connected with the fxml file via data binding.
Client
Client class is responsible for the connection to the server and for storing the properties connected with the GUI.
EndOfGameController
This class is the controller class for the End of Game fxml file and it represents the end of game pop-up window.
EndOfRoundController
This class is the controller class for the End of Game fxml file and it represents the end of game pop-up window.
ErrorController
ErrorController Class is responsible for the Error Window that pops up when an error occurs.
Game
Game class is the central component of the server side, which contents the total logical functions of the Game Love Letter.
LoginController
LoginController Class is responsible for the LogIn Window that appears at the beginning of the game It is connected with the FXML LogInWindow File and with logInViewModel in order to complete the conditions of a MVVM model
LoginViewModel
logInVieModel Class represents the UI state and it should provide the properties included in the FXML file of the LogIn Window, in order to bind with the LoginController
QuestionController
Controller for question window
Server
server class listens for incoming clients and manages the communication with the clients
ServerThread
server thread for several client request
WindowLauncher
class for creating the stages and opening the windows
